name: ARC for Firefox
description:
Arc Firefox theme for Windows.  Goes with my Windows 10 theme here...
http://fav.me/da82xrs

user.name: Jamie Green
user.about:
I'm a Windows Visual Style designer hobbyist.  I go by the name of neiio on deviantart.

Check out my profile there for skins, icons, wallpapers and more!

additional_info:
INITIAL RELEASE | August 15 2016

This is released with permission from my friend Mokocchi...
https://userstyles.org/users/268662

It's another deep mod of her awesome 'Moko Firefox' Theme found here...
https://userstyles.org/styles/105352/moko-firefox-theme

Get the matching Windows 10 theme here...
http://fav.me/da82xrs

*CREDITS TO horst3180 for the original Linux theme
http://horst3180.deviantart.com/
